Secret 6 description
Secret 6
Freshy’s old PDA
These are the things I saved for a rainy day. If it ever comes, I’ll definitely come here for my supplies.
Rookie’s stash
Weapons and ammo will be useful when fighting the military and bandits.
Safe with weapons and ammo
PDA with migration map
The migration map helps locate rare species of monsters and use them for scientific research.
PDA with data on weapons upgrades
Electronic diagrams will help with weapons upgrades.
PDA with valuable information
No data.
Fang’s PDA
Fang’s PDA.
Secret information about military activity at the warehouses.
Stalker group commander’s PDA
General’s PDA
The PDA contains secret information about the immediate plans of the military at the Cordon.
Driver’s friend’s PDA
Driver’s friend’s PDA.
Information about weapons upgrades
Information about weapons upgrades.
Secret military data
Secret data.
Commander’s PDA
PDA belonging to the commander of the stalker group. Contains valuable information about bandits’ plans to seize army warehouse territories.
PDA with a map of the Red Forest
This PDA has a map of the Red Forest, which shows the anomalous area and the space anomaly on it. It seems that the anomaly can transfer you to where Forester lives.
This PDA contains technical documentation which may help scientists figure out what caused such a powerful psy-field to appear at Yantar.
Lost party’s PDA
Smuggler’s PDA
Smuggler’s PDA, found among Stringov’s possessions.
Old PDA, found under the false bottom of the toolbox at Freshy’s camp.
Flash drive with data on superlight kevlar body armor
Flash drive with data on balancing the automated parts of a machine gun
Flash drive with data on sniper rifle barrels
Flash drive with data on modifying the gas exhaust of a machine gun
Flash drive with data on an electronic stabilizer for sniper rifles
Flash drive with data on balancing automated parts
Flash drive with data on a pistol muzzle break
Flash drive with data on a submachine gun muzzle break
Flash drive with data on pump mechanisms for combat shotguns
Flash drive with data on pump mechanisms for shotguns
Flash drive with data on reinforced body armor
Flash drive with data on pistol barrel modification
Flash drive with data on submachine gun barrel modification
Flash drive with data on an electronic stabilization system for shotguns
Flash drive with data on a psy-protection system
Flash drive with data on a machine gun muzzle break
Flash drive with data on a sniper rifle muzzle break
Flash drive with data on a closed-cycle breathing module
PDA with drawings only a genius can understand.
Uncle Yar’s buddy’s PDA
Commandant Lingov’s personal PDA. Contains information about collaboration with mercenaries, among other things.
Lingov’s PDA
Freedom stalker’s PDA
The PDA of a Freedom fighter, containing a recording of the conversation between the attackers.
Code-locked suitcase. Exceptionally valuable to Sidorovich.
Loot
No data.
PDA
Duty member’s assault rifle
The rifle’s inventory number is carefully marked on it with white paint. This degree of thoroughness suggests that it belongs to a Duty soldier.
Duty member’s case
The case is locked using a combination lock. The sound it makes suggests that it contains several items. An entry on the top side of the case made with a marker indicates the owner’s Duty call sign.
PDA with secret information
The PDA contains several entries, which make it clear that it belongs to a member of Duty. The rest of the contents are well-encrypted.
Ripper shotgun

It looks like this weapon was the subject of a brutal attack. A factory message on the butt indicates that the shotgun comes from a limited edition batch, notable for its better coating and the terrifying name: “Ripper”.
Trophy AKM-47/2
An old, worn-down assault rifle with claw marks on the stock. A legendary weapon.
Lucky detector
An old detector with chewing gum and banana stickers on it. It looks fairly regular, and it’s difficult to believe that anyone would consider it anything special.
“Magic” vodka
A murky liquid with a strong smell of alcohol. It’s probably 80-90%, so it’s best avoided.
NPR-21p special medkit
The medkit is marked with the words “NPR-21p antiradiation kit (test model)”. The directions contain a huge list of rather unpleasant side-effects.
Durable leather jacket
It looks like the previous owner of this jacket was torn to shreds by an anomaly, but, oddly, the jacket hasn’t got a scratch on it.
Cossacks 2 vodka
Judging by the badly-attached sticker and the odd sediment at the bottom of the bottle, this vodka is home-made.
Modified shooter
A real badboy of a weapon. A technician of some skill seems to have significantly improved its initial characteristics.
Inscribed pistol
There is an inscription on the handle of this pistol. What can be made out of it reads “For s..vice be..nd the ca.. of ..ty”.
Bandit Chaser 13
A few doodles on the shotgun barrel appear to depict stalkers killed with the weapon.
PDA with a map of the Red Forest

This PDA contains a map of the Red Forest with marks on it. The marks indicate areas with high levels of radiation. The last record was made at 23:15 and reads “We should have stayed the night at the bridge, we won’t make it out of this forest at night”.
Experimental device
A device with a number of switches and indicators. Contains no instructions which could help understand its purpose.
Tank machine gun
This machine gun is intended for mounting onto a tank turret, but can be used just as well as a hand-held machine gun.
USB drive with movies on it
The USB drive contains the latest movies, but they can’t be watched on a PDA due to their resolution.
Serega’s guitar
A note made on the handle of this guitar with a ball-point pen indicates that it was a gift to someone called Serega from his girlfriend.
8x scope
An excellent scope with a special mount that is probably only compatible with a hunting rifle.
Souvenir grenade
A training grenade. There is a chain and a keyring in the shape of a white rabbit attached to the pin.
“Scarlet Flower”
A mysterious artifact of unknown origin. Produces virtually no emissions: its only confirmed effect is to woo women.
